content: A Psalm; a Song at the Dedication of the House (Temple).  of David.
And have not let my enemies rejoice over me.
I cried to You for help, and You have healed me.
O , You have brought my life up from Sheol (the nether world, the place of the dead);
You have kept me alive, so that I would not go down to the pit (grave).
Sing to the , O you His godly ones,
And give thanks at the mention of His holy .
For His anger is but for a moment,
His favor is for a lifetime.
Weeping may endure for a night,
But a shout of joy comes in the morning.
